criterias.normal: energy, importance of pitch, cleanness of the stall, control of direction and exit or connection
criterias.twisted: twisted on the entry, stay twisted when the glider stalls, untwist during the dive
criterias.twisted exit: the twist must be kept for at least 3 seconds or until the next manoeuvre
criterias.devil twist: twisted on the entry, untwist during the stall and immediately twist to the other direction, must exit twisted. The twist must be kept for at least 3 seconds or until the next manoeuvre
criterias.flip: body flip either forward or backwards during the stall. Flip may begin during the climb out and must be completed before the dive
criterias.flip_double: both flips must be chained, flow
